name: Ena Henderson

last_movies.title: 监视资本主义：智能陷阱

introduction: Raised in Alabama, Ena (Henderson Burrud) O'Rourke studied theater at Huntingdon College and the Montgomery School of Fine Arts in the 1980's. Ena moved to LA in 1990 securing roles in film and TV immediately. She married John Burrud of Burrud Productions and worked in front of and behind the camera for over 15 years taking a hiatus in 2000. She opened a successful private practice in Yoga Therapy. In 2015, however, Ena returned to acting and signed with Donna Baldwin Agency in Denver, Colorado. Since then she has landed roles on CBS, SAG commercial work and modeling. She is married to Steve Rodriguez and has two children, Jack O'Rourke Burrud and her daughter Chloe Burrud, also with Donna Baldwin.
family_member: John Burrud	(11 June 1994 - 25 January 2010) ( divorced) ( 2 children)
